WorkItem.ClosedComment: Misconception, no real issue unless the user can explain otherwise
WorkItem.Description:
Minor Issue: When I optimize (for mage at least) the ring slots aren't interchangeable. e.g. If the 2nd slot ring is identical to the 1st slot of the base spec, the optimized spec does not consider it the same. In the game stats they produce identical results.
Â 
I suppose it may be the same with trinkets.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] When I optimize (for mage at least) the ring slots aren't interchangeable

Comments.Message: Rings and Trinkets should only be able to swap to the other slot *if* the alternate ring/trinket changed too. You could manually move them back but that's the difference. If both rings hadn't changed, they would have stayed the same after the optimize.
